${ModID}:PierceVeil.NAME: Pierce Veil
${ModID}:PierceVeil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put 1 of the top !M! cards of your draw pile into your hand.

${ModID}:Stall.NAME: Stall
${ModID}:Stall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put up to !M! cards from your hand on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:RiskOfBlades.NAME: Risk Of Blades
${ModID}:RiskOfBlades.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each Attack in the top 3 cards of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Crossroads.NAME: Crossroads
${ModID}:Crossroads.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Play the top card of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Anticipation.NAME: Anticipation
${ModID}:Anticipation.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Gain Strength equal to its cost.
${ModID}:Anticipation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain Strength equal to their cost.

${ModID}:Prediction.NAME: Prediction
${ModID}:Prediction.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If no enemy intends to attack, gain it next turn instead.

${ModID}:Enigmancy.NAME: Enigmancy
${ModID}:Enigmancy.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Each turn, gain !${ModID}:m2! Energy and reduce this gain by 1.

${ModID}:Recurrence.NAME: Recurrence
${ModID}:Recurrence.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a copy of your hand into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:DivineMight.NAME: Divine Might
${ModID}:DivineMight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When [#EFC851]Divine [#EFC851]Might is played twice, ${ModID}:Ascend.
